```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'Name': ['Alice', 'Bob', 'Aritra'],
...                    'Age': [25, 30, 35],
...                    'Location': ['Seattle', 'New York', 'Kona']},
...                   index=([10, 20, 30]))
>>> df.index
Index([10, 20, 30], dtype='int64') 
```

```py
>>> df.index = [100, 200, 300]
>>> df
 Name  Age Location
100  Alice   25  Seattle
200    Bob   30 New York
300  Aritra  35    Kona 
```
